A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A very solid addition to the franchise. There were only a few moments that I found to be rather unnecessary and one moment\, while awesome\, was a bit ridiculous. Through all of it\, however\, I found myself realizing one major thing: I don't understand everything about the Force\, and that's a good thing. I didn't want to understand how everything in the Force because it makes it feel magical\, and that's what this movie does. Great action scenes\, a couple standout moments and a major step forward into the relationship of Rey and Kylo/Ben that makes me feel excited for whatever the final chapter of this Trilogy may bring.
